title: Dwyane Wade, Gabrielle Union and Rihanna make Vanity Fair's 2019 Best-Dressed List
text:
Vanity Fair unveiled its 2019 Best-Dressed List, putting the spotlight on 40 "icons" who have changed the fashion game, according to the mag.

Among those who got the thumbs-up this year: Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union, who are on the magazine's list of "The Ensembles" -- fashionable married couples, duos or groups. Lisa Bonet from "The Cosby Show" and her husband, "Aquaman" star Jason Momoa, were also recognized in the category.

The Best Dressed List also includes Jennifer Lopez, Rihanna, Zendaya, Solange Knowles, Mahershala Ali, Cicely Tyson, Frank Ocean, Lena Waithe, Billy Porter and Tyler, the Creator.

Vanity Fair will be celebrating the 2019 Best-Dressed list with an exclusive party Thursday evening in New York City.

Here are some of Vanity Fair's selections for 2019. The full list can be found at VanityFair.com.

The Classics:

Jennifer Lopez

Mahershala Ali

Cicely Tyson

Frank Ocean

Keanu Reeves

Philanthropist Pamela Joyner

The Virtuosos:

Zendaya

Zoë Kravitz

NBA star Serge Ibaka of the Toronto Raptors

Céline Dion

Priyanka Chopra Jonas

The Originals:

Solange Knowles

Tyler, the Creator

Lena Waithe

Billy Porter

Visual artist Kehinde Wiley

The Ensembles:

Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union

George and Amal Clooney

Jason Momoa and Lisa Bonet

Victoria and David Beckham

The Pros
